page.title: 06Community Nursing
page.content: An important part of the medical service provided in the town is{Esk {House Clinic.}Run by Tayside Health Board it provides varied services;the main service being District Nurses. There are 7 District Nurses who treat members of the public in their own homes.This is especially important to elderly or housebound patients.There is 1 Family Planning Nurse shared by the whole of Angus.The Community Dentist treats pre-school,school age, expectant mothers,mentally handicapped people and OAP's.They also have a staff based in local hospitals.These include Midwives,Speech Therapists, Dietician and an Optician. There is a{Red Cross}Branch which helps at shows and local gatherings dealing with minor complaints. {Dorward House}provides residential care for the elderly.
